text: Ra jasale naramra kama gare, tiniharuko duskarmako pratiphala pani tyastai nai hunecha ra apamanale tiniharuko anuharala'i dhaknecha, ra kohi pani tiniharula'i allahako krodhabata baca'unevala hunechaina. Tiniharuko anuharako kalopanako avastha yasto hunecha jasto kalo ratika aneka parataharubata chopi'eka chan. Yiniharu narkama jane hun, ra sadhaim tyasaima rahanechan
